originalText.text: I had an amazing time being honored, celebrated and pampered for Mother's Day by 100 Suits for 100 Men. Spirit of excellence service, beautiful establishment, amazing and friendly staff, owner Kevin awesome gentleman. I felt completely valued and appreciated upon exiting the premises. I give them ***** 5 Stars.

originalText.text: The atmosphere was beautiful.  I had a great time on mother's day.  Good food, good music,  good people,  especially loved my massage.  Thank you. Queens United was in the house.

originalText.text: Please be careful about donating to this company. Make sure to get a receipt right away. . After asking for a receipt multiple times from Mr. Livingston, he appeared to be insulted. He even blocked me on his social media account and phone. Accusing me of “harassing” him. All incidents have reported to proper authorities.
